2️⃣ Add New Product
session_expired: Session expired. Send trigger to start again.
no_products_found: No products found in your store. Add some products first!
add_product_prompt:
Please provide the product details in this format:

Name: Product Name
Price: 29.99
Stock: 10
Description: Product description (optional)

Send "stop" to cancel.
validation_error_price: Price must be a valid number (e.g., 29.99)
validation_error_stock: Stock must be a whole number (e.g., 10)

error_forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action. Please check your API permissions.
error_not_found: The store or resource was not found. Please check the store URL.
error_duplicate_sku: A product with this SKU already exists. Please try again.
error_invalid_data: The product data is invalid. Please check the values and try again.
error_server: The store server is having issues. Please try again in a few minutes.
error_unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
list_products_error: Could not fetch products from your store.
